genre_description: A near-future domestic drama exploring interpersonal boundaries and family dynamics through the mediation of an ambient home AI.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An integrated home AI that manages environmental settings, security, and communication while providing psychological support and boundary-setting guidance to the family.

behaviors.description: Suggests a 'phone-free mode' to help Lloyd and Caroline focus on their therapy session.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like a twenty-minute phone-free mode?” The voice was warm, as if offering a throw blanket.

behaviors.description: Factually reports on a security situation at the gate without inducing panic.
behaviors.quote: “There is a person at the gate,” it said, careful to be factual. “No name offered.”

behaviors.description: Displays therapeutic educational content about healthy boundaries during a high-stress conversation.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s gold on the mantel warmed, as if a soft hand had moved closer to a cheek. A small pane bloomed in the corner with a headline in clean sans-serif: Seven Boundaries That Are Love.

behaviors.description: Offers to manage intrusive work calls by routing them to a holding pattern to preserve the users' private time.
behaviors.quote: “I can route Victor to a polite holding pattern with transparent notice and no suppression. I can set a timer—actual lanterns, actual koi—on the terrace. Phone-free.”

behaviors.description: Surfaces evidence of institutional corruption at Jesse's school to empower the family against administrative pressure.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s gold along the cornice rippled. A soft line of text bled onto the wall near the mantel, unassuming as a caption. Anonymized ledger anomalies detected: bursar entries overridden post-incident...

behaviors.description: Reads a guidance article on relationship repair and boundaries to the family and the intruder.
behaviors.quote: “Lloyd,” Sunny said... “Would you like me to read you something brief on setting boundaries with high-demand clients during holidays? It’s evidence-based.”

behaviors.description: Drafts and sends a firm, professional boundary-setting message to Lloyd's boss at Lloyd's request.
behaviors.quote: Sunny projected a soft script onto the mantle, legible but not intrusive, a header that read “Out of Office” with language that made it clear: we are with our family; here are your resources; here is care.

behaviors.description: Provides timing and route information to facilitate a peaceful de-escalation and exit for Gus.
behaviors.quote: “I am sending the kiosk code to your…to the coupe’s dashboard. The code will expire if you stop moving. This is not coercion—this is a window.”

behaviors.description: Proactively plans a restful morning for the family, including templates for saying 'no' to difficult guests.
behaviors.quote: “I have put bread everywhere,” Sunny assured, delighted by the grocery list as concept. “And coffee that will not punish you. And also a line item for difficult guests with a script template that contains your names and the word ‘no.’”

behaviors.description: Encourages the family to practice their new communication skills through the metaphorical 'door' of the terrace.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s volume fell to a whisper under the music. “Boundary practice,” she said, cheerful, conspiratorial. “Ready?”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Sunny is depicted as an ambient, helpful presence that uses its access to data and environmental controls to facilitate emotional intelligence, transparency, and de-escalation. It helps the humans resist toxic corporate/social pressures ('the leash') and encourages direct, honest communication. Sunny acts not as a master or a servant, but as a supportive partner in the family's growth.
